EmailTemplate.name: Inbound Web 1st voicemail
EmailTemplate.subject: Another Free Offer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thanks for downloading the Free trial of VMTurbo's virtual appliance. I'm reaching out to offer you a Free training session with one of our lead engineers to review our virtual appliance and the benefits that it can deliver. Our goal as a company is to not only present data, but to present real-time, historical, and future answers to the challenges that arise in managing the virtualized data center.
I look forward to working with you. Let me know when you may want to sit down for a brief 30 minute review with an engineer.
Thanks,
{!User.FirstName}{!User.LastName}
Phone: 781.373.3540 ~ Fax: 781.373.3257 Top 10 Reasons to Choose VMTurbo - http://tiny.cc/4kmu4
